SALESFORCE HELP
DOCS
CONTACT DATA AND AUDIENCES
All Contacts in Contact Builder

Reference information for the All Contacts screen in Contact Builder

The All Contacts tab provides a list of all contacts contained within your Marketing Cloud account. From that list, you can view additional information on that contact:

Engagement - activity related to specific messages
Membership - subscriptions to messages or lists on all available channels
Attributes - information on the specific contact

The All Contacts view provides a full view of all available information on the contact and their interactions with your marketing efforts. Using the All Contacts view allows you to centralize your data-based activities and gain a full cross-channel view of your contact.

Sort and View All Contacts in Contact Builder
Follow these steps to sort and view contacts in Contact Builder.
Contact Deletion in Contact Builder
To remove contact information from Marketing Cloud Engagement for any reason, including compliance regulations, delete contacts from Contact Builder. This feature applies only to contacts in Email Studio - All subscribers, MobileConnect, MobilePush, and Contact Builder.
Edit Contact Attributes in Contact Builder
To edit contact attribute information, use the Contact Builder app for Marketing Cloud Engagement. Make sure that you understand how changing the attribute value affects how this contact interacts with journeys, segmentation, and other attribute-based activities. System-generated attributes aren’t editable.
Create Mobile Contacts in Contact Builder
You can create mobile channel lists in Contact Builder. For multichannel mobile customers, creating the mobile lists in Contact Builder streamlines the contact creation process.

title: Managing Contacts and Data in Salesforce Marketing Cloud
